name: Blind Mini Golf
description:
YOU MUST BE IN FULLSCREEN TO PLAY. 

Simple 18-hole mini golf made using unity.  Use your mouse to aim and click space to hit the ball.  Avoid the sand traps, if you get caught in one, the ball will disappear. Hit r to restart your level. The catch? You cannot see how strong your shot is going to be. The farther away your cursor is from the ball, the stronger your shot will be, but you can't see your cursor while you play. There are ways to work around this, which makes strategy very important to success in this game.
